card.name: Anubis
card.property: When you play Anubis, destroy a support character. Each time you revive Anubis, your opponent destroys a support character.

card.name: Anubis
card.property: Failure: Incapacitate a team character.

card.name: Apophis
card.property: Each time you revive Apophis, your opponent loses 2 power for each Goa'uld card at the current mission.

card.name: Apophis
card.property: Each time you assign Apophis, your opponent may stop two characters. If they don't, you may stop a character.

card.name: Ardent Prior
card.property: Failure: Destroy all stopped support and assigned support characters.

card.name: Baal
card.property: Stop Baal, pay 3 power – Incapacitate a stopped team character.

card.name: Caulder
card.property: Failure: You may move a glyph from one team character to another.

card.name: Devout Prior
card.property: When Devout Prior is destroyed, you may destroy a support character or gear.

card.name: Fifth
card.property: Each time you revive Fifth, place the top card of your deck face down beneath him. For each card beneath Fifth, he gets difficulty +1 and revive cost +1.

card.name: Frank Simmons
card.property: While Frank Simmons is assigned, to assign a character, your opponent pays 1 power for each other Political card at the current mission.

card.name: Hathor
card.property: Each time you assign Hathor, each character already assigned gets skills -1 until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Imhotep
card.property: When you play Imhotep, choose one: Stop a Jaffa team character, or stop all Jaffa support characters.

card.name: Ja'din
card.property: Failure: Destroy a gear.

card.name: Klorel
card.property: Each time you assign Klorel, you may block a character from the current mission.

card.name: Mollem
card.property: Each time you assign Mollem, your opponent gains 2 power, and you may destroy a support character.

card.name: Mot
card.property: Block Mot from the current mission, reveal a card from hand and pay its cost – Place that card face up beneath Mot. You can do this only if no card is beneath him. Place a card beneath Mot in your discard pile – Gain power equal to its cost.

card.name: Nirrti
card.property: Each time you assign Nirrti, for each Science obstacle at the current mission, choose a support character. At the end of the mission, destroy those characters.

card.name: Osiris
card.property: Each of your obstacles that doesn't have Withdraw gets: "Withdraw X", where X is equal to that obstacle's cost.

card.name: Replicator Carter
card.property: Each time you assign Replicator Carter, you may take a Replicator card from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Robert Kinsey
card.property: Robert Kinsey gets difficulty +1 for each Political obstacle and for each failed mission this turn.

card.name: Samuels
card.property: Samuels' difficulty is equal to the experience of the current mission.

card.name: Shak'l
card.property: Each time you would take a card from the top of your deck to revive a Goa'uld adversary, you may discard a card instead.

card.name: Sokar
card.property: Failure: Your opponent chooses a glyph from an assigned character and puts it on the bottom of their mission pile.

card.name: Tanith
card.property: Complications cost you power -1 to play.

card.name: Trofsky
card.property: Trofsky gets difficulty +1 for each Jaffa obstacle at the current mission.

card.name: Yu
card.property: Yu gets difficulty +1 for each successful mission this turn.

card.name: Anise
card.property: When you play Anise, you may stop a team character. If you do, ready a different team character.

card.name: Aris Boch
card.property: To assign Aris Boch, pay 2 power and discard a card.

card.name: Artok
card.property: Artok costs power -1 to play while the current mission is a Combat mission. Artok costs power -1 to play while there is at least one complication.

card.name: Bauer
card.property: While an NID character is assigned, the current mission gets: "Success: Look at the top card of your mission pile. Then you may stop Bauer. If you do, place that card on the bottom of that pile."

card.name: Bill Lee
card.property: Bill Lee gets skills +1 for each successful mission this turn.

card.name: Burke
card.property: When you play Burke, the current mission gets difficulty -1.

card.name: Chaka
card.property: When you play Chaka, he's blocked until the end of the turn.

card.name: Chekov
card.property: Success: The next mission this turn gets difficult -1 (or difficulty -2 instead, if another Russian is assigned).

card.name: Cross
card.property: When you play Cross, choose a team character to get skills +1 until the end of the turn. If that character isn't an NID character, stop Cross.

card.name: Darian
card.property: Each time your opponent plays a complication, if Darian is ready, you gain 1 power.

card.name: Drey'auc
card.property: Drey'auc costs power -2 to play if there was a successful mission this turn.

card.name: Elizabeth Weir
card.property: Each time your opponent plays an adversary, you may stop Elizabeth Weir and discard a card. If you do, stop that adversary.

card.name: Frank Cromwell
card.property: Frank Cromwell is blocked while the current mission has no obstacles.

card.name: Freyr
card.property: To assign Freyr, pay 2 power, unless there was at least one successful mission this turn.

card.name: Fro'tak
card.property: Stop and destroy Fro'tak – At the end of your opponent's next power phase, you gain 2 power.

card.name: Gairwyn
card.property: When you play Gairwyn, obstacles cost power +1 to play until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Garshaw
card.property: While Garshaw is ready and at least one Tok'ra character is assigned, complications cost power +1 to play.

card.name: George Hammond
card.property: At the start of your debrief phase, for each SGC character who has a glyph, you may discard a card.

card.name: Gerak
card.property: While you have 4 or more power remaining, Gerak gets skills +1.

card.name: Haikon
card.property: Stop Haikon – Block an adversary from the current mission.

card.name: Hank Landry
card.property: Stop Hank Landry, discard a card – Search your mission pile for a mission, shuffle the rest of that pile, then place that mission on top of it.

card.name: Harlan
card.property: Stop Harlan – Play a support character at normal cost, even if you already control a character who has the same title. At the end of this turn, destroy that character.

card.name: Heimdall
card.property: Success: You may draw two cards.

card.name: Henry Hayes
card.property: At the end of your power phase, gain 1 power. To assign Henry Hayes, pay 2 power and discard a card.

card.name: Jamala
card.property: When you play Jamala, you may stop him and pay 3 power. If you do, ready a team character.

card.name: Janet Fraiser
card.property: Janet Fraiser gets skills +1 while there is at least one obstacle.

card.name: Jarrod Kane
card.property: When you play Jarrod Kane, you may pay 2 power and discard a card. If you do, ready an incapacitated character.

card.name: Joe Faxon
card.property: Success: You may destroy Joe Faxon. If you do, ready a character.

card.name: Joe Spencer
card.property: When you play Joe Spencer, choose a team character. Joe Spencer gets Ingenuity +1 for each different glyph the chosen team character has.

card.name: Jolan
card.property: Choose a team character, discard a card – Until the end of the turn, that team character has Combat +1 and Ingenuity +1. You can do this only once each turn.

card.name: Keffler
card.property: Keffler gets Science +1 while there is at least one complication. Keffler gets Science +1 while assigned with another NID character.

card.name: Kendra
card.property: When you play Kendra, you may destroy all complications.

card.name: Khonsum
card.property: Each time you assign Khonsu, you may pay 3 power. If you do, turn an obstacle at the current mission face down.

card.name: Kieran
card.property: Each time you play a Combat mission, you may pay 1 power and discard a card. If you don't, destroy Kieran.

card.name: Malcolm Barrett
card.property: Malcolm Barrett costs power -1 to play for each adversary.

card.name: Malek
card.property: When you play Malek, you may move a glyph from one character to another.

card.name: Mark Devlin
card.property: During your opponent's turn, Mark Devlin becomes an adversary. He can't be revived or scored.

card.name: Martin Lloyd
card.property: Each time your opponent passes, if Martin Lloyd is assigned, he gets Ingenuity +1 until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Merrin
card.property: When you assign Merrin, at the end of the current mission, destroy her.

card.name: Nicholas Ballard
card.property: Discard a card – Nicholas Ballard gets Culture +2 until the end of the current mission. At the end of the current mission, destroy him. You can do this only once each turn.

card.name: Nyan
card.property: Success: Your opponent loses 2 power and you gain 1 power.

card.name: Ocker
card.property: Stop and destroy Ocker – Look at the top five cards of your opponent's deck. Place them in any order on the top and/or bottom of that deck.

card.name: Olaf
card.property: When you play Olaf, you may block an adversary from the current mission.

card.name: Oma Desala
card.property: While Oma Desala is assigned, each other assigned character gets skills +1.

card.name: Orlin
card.property: Destroy Orlin, pay X power – Destroy an obstacle that costs X.

card.name: Osbourne
card.property: Stop Osbourne – Draw a card.

card.name: Paul Davis
card.property: Success: Each other SGC character gets skills +1 until the end of the turn.

card.name: Raully
card.property: When you play Raully, you may pay 2 power. If you do, unblock a character.

card.name: Richard Woolsey
card.property: Richard Woolsey gets skills +1 for each failed mission this turn.

card.name: Rodney McKay
card.property: When you play Rodney McKay, for each complication and for each obstacle at the current mission, he gets skills +1 until the end of the turn.

card.name: Rya'c
card.property: Rya'c gets skills +1 while an adversary is assigned.

card.name: Satterfield
card.property: While Satterfield is assigned, she gets skills +1 for each assigned SGC character who has a glyph.

card.name: Thor
card.property: When you play Thor, you may search your mission pile for a mission. If you do, shuffle the rest of the pile, then place that mission on top of it.

card.name: Tolok
card.property: When you play Tolok, you may pay 2 power and discard a card. If you do, ready another Jaffa character.

card.name: Vidrine
card.property: Each time you play a gear, you may ready Vidrine.

card.name: Walter Harriman
card.property: At the start of your power phase, you may look at the top two cards of your mission pile. If you do, place one of those cards on the top of that pile and one on the bottom.

card.name: Warrick
card.property: Success: Gain 1 power.

card.name: Whitlow
card.property: Each time your opponent plays a complication, you may draw a card.

card.name: Aldwin
card.property: Each time Aldwin earns a glyph, your opponent discards a random card for each glyph Aldwin has.

card.name: Balinsky
card.property: While Balinsky has more glyphs than the number of obstacles at the current mission, he gets skills +1.

card.name: Bra'tac
card.property: Libra or Scorpius: While Bra'tac is ready, each Jaffa support character gets skills +1. Gemini and Pisces: While Bra'tac is ready, each Jaffa support character gets skills +1.

card.name: Cameron Mitchell
card.property: Orion: Cameron Mitchell gets skills +1 while assigned to the first mission played this turn.

card.name: Charles Kawalsky
card.property: Each time you assign Charles Kawalsky, you may draw a card for each different glyph he has.

card.name: Daniel Jackson
card.property: At the end of your power phase, gain 1 power for each different glyph Daniel Jackson has.

card.name: Daniel Jackson
card.property: Gemini: Daniel Jackson gets Combat +1. Triangulum: Daniel Jackson gets Combat +1.

card.name: George Hammond
card.property: George Hammond gets experience +1 for each different glyph beneath him.

card.name: Harold Maybourne
card.property: Scorpius, Stop Harold Maybourne – All other team characters get skills +1 until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Ishta
card.property: Each time Ishta earns a glyph she already has, you may destroy an adversary.

card.name: Jack O'Neill
card.property: Gemini and Libra: Each time you play a mission, gain 1 power.

card.name: Jack O'Neill
card.property: Each time Jack O'Neill earns a different glyph, the next mission this turn gets difficulty -1.

card.name: Jacob Carter
card.property: Pisces: Jacob Carter gets skills +1 while assigned with another Tok'ra character. Scorpius: Jacob Carter gets skills +1 while assigned with an SGC character.

card.name: Janet Fraiser
card.property: Orion or Triangulum: Each time you play a Science mission, you may pay 3 power. If you do, ready Janet Fraiser.

card.name: Makepeace
card.property: Destroy a gear – Makepeace gets skills +1 until the end of the current mission for each different glyph he has. You can do this only once each turn.

card.name: Martouf
card.property: Each other character who has at least one glyph matching one of Martouf's gets skills +1.

card.name: Rak'nor
card.property: Rak'nor gets skills +1 for each different glyph he has that at least one other character has.

card.name: Samantha Carter
card.property: Triangulum, Stop Samantha Carter – Turn an obstacle at the current location face down.

card.name: Samantha Carter
card.property: Libra, Stop and incapacitate Samantha Carter – destroy all obstacles at the current mission.

card.name: Svetlana Markov
card.property: Orion: Svetlana Markov gets Culture +1. Libra:Svetlana Markov gets Science +1. Triangulum: Svetlana Markov gets Ingenuity +1.

card.name: Teal'c
card.property: Orion: Complications cost power +1 to play while Teal'c is assigned. Pisces: Complications cost power +1 to play while Teal'c is assigned.

card.name: Teal'c
card.property: Each time Teal'c earns a glyph, your opponent loses 1 power for each different glyph Teal'c has.

card.name: Thor
card.property: Each time Thor earns a different glyph, you may pay 3 power. If you do, ready each other character who has a glyph matching it.

card.name: Vala Mal Doran
card.property: Vala Mal Doran gets skills +1 while assigned to a mission that has a glyph matching one of hers.

card.name: Zukhov
card.property: Each time Zukhov earns a Pisces glyph, you may search your deck for a card. If you do, reveal it, take it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

card.name: Antiquity
card.property: Choose a team character to get Culture +1 until the end of the current mission. If they're a Tok'ra character, they get Culture +2 until the end of the current mission instead.

card.name: Barter
card.property: To play this event, stop a character. Gain power equal to that character's ING.

card.name: Close Inspection
card.property: To play this event, stop a character. Choose a number of non-event cards from your discard pile equal to that character's Science. Shuffle them into your deck.

card.name: Coordinated Movements
card.property: Ready each character who has a glyph.

card.name: Goofing Off
card.property: Ready an assigned character.

card.name: Heroism
card.property: To play this event, you must stop and incapacitate a character. For each different glyph that character has, you may ready a character.

card.name: Ill-Gotten Gains
card.property: To play this event, stop a team character. Search your deck for a card, reveal it, take it into hand, and shuffle your deck.

card.name: Keep in Check
card.property: Return an adversary to their owner's hand. Then you may stop a Tok'ra character. If you do, gain 2 power.

card.name: Learning from the Enemy
card.property: Draw a card for each obstacle at the current mission and for each assigned NID character.

card.name: Loyal Sacrifice
card.property: When you play this event, destroy any number of your Jaffa support characters. For each one you destroyed, ready a team character.

card.name: Mission Files
card.property: Choose an Ingenuity obstacle card in your opponent's discard pile. Destroy a copy of that obstacle card at the current mission.

card.name: Nice Shot
card.property: Choose a team character to get Combat +1 until the end of the current mission. If they're a Jaffa character, they get Combat +2 until the end of the current mission instead.

card.name: Pull Out
card.property: Ready all assigned team characters.

card.name: Quick Study
card.property: Choose a team character to get Ingenuity +1 until the end of the current mission. If they're an SGC character, they get Ingenuity +2 until the end of the current mission instead.

card.name: R and R
card.property: Block all team characters from the current mission. At the end of the mission, each ready team character gets skills +1 until the end of the turn.

card.name: Receiving a Go
card.property: Look at one card from the top of your mission pile for each ready SGC character. Place those cards in any order on the top and/or bottom of that pile.

card.name: Reconnaissance
card.property: Look at your opponent's hand and choose two cards from it. They play one of them at no cost as a complication.

card.name: Recuperate
card.property: Stop an incapacitated character.

card.name: Return Trip
card.property: To play this event, stop a character. Exchange a glyph that character has for the top card of your mission pile.

card.name: Roundup
card.property: Choose an adversary. Until the end of the turn, that adversary can't be revived.

card.name: Seasoned Travelers
card.property: Choose a team character to get skills +1 until the end of the current mission for each glyph they have.

card.name: Sense of Adventure
card.property: Ready a character.

card.name: Special Training
card.property: Choose a team character to get Science +1 until the end of the current mission. If they're an NID character, they get Science +2 until the end of the current mission instead.

card.name: Suppression Fire
card.property: To play this event, stop a character. Draw a number of cards equal to that character's COM.

card.name: Tabloid Research
card.property: To play this event, stop a character. Look at a number of cards from the top of your mission pile equal to that character's Culture. Place those cards in any order on the top and/or bottom of that pile.

card.name: Tight-knit Team
card.property: Move a glyph from one character to another.

card.name: Top Minds
card.property: To play this event, stop two characters. Destroy an obstacle.

card.name: Yeeeehaaaw!
card.property: Destroy an obstacle or an assigned adversary.

card.name: Alpha Site Facility
card.property: At the start of your debrief phase, if there have been no failed mission this turn, you may destroy a support character and place them face down beneath this gear. You get 1 experience for each card beneath this gear.

card.name: Asgard Transporter
card.property: Stop this gear, pay 1 power for each assigned character – Ready all assigned characters.

card.name: Atoniek Armband
card.property: Block a character from the current mission – Place this on them. You can do this only once each turn. While this gear is on a character, that character has skills +2. At the end of your turn, if this is on a character, take it off.

card.name: DHD
card.property: Stop this gear, pay 4 power – Search your mission pile for a mission, shuffle the rest of the pile, then place that mission on top of it.

card.name: Dialing Computer
card.property: At the start of your debrief phase, you may place any of your failed missions on top of your mission pile in any order.

card.name: Galaran Memory Device
card.property: Stop this gear, discard a card – Take a hero card from your discard pile and shuffle that card into your deck.

card.name: Hazard Suits
card.property: Stop this gear, pay 2 power – Remove the failure text from a Science obstacle at the current mission.

card.name: Healing Device
card.property: Each time a support character would be destroyed, you may stop this gear and pay 2 power. If you do, stop that character instead.

card.name: Iris
card.property: Failure text on villain cards is optional. To use the failure text of an obstacle, your opponent pays 1 power.

card.name: MALP
card.property: Destroy this gear, discard a card – The next time your opponent passes at the current mission, he can do nothing but pass until the end of the mission.

card.name: Naquadah Reactor
card.property: At the end of your power phase, gain 1 power. Stop and destroy this gear, pay 6 power – Destroy an obstacle at the current mission.

card.name: P90
card.property: Stop this gear, block a team character from the current mission – Obstacles cost power +1 to play until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Quantum Mirror
card.property: Pay 1 power – Discard a card.

card.name: Sarcophagus
card.property: Stop this gear, pay 2 power – Ready a character. That character gets skills -1 until the end of the turn.

card.name: Staff Weapon
card.property: Stop this gear, pay 3 power – Stop a ready adversary.

card.name: Symbiote Poison
card.property: Destroy this gear, pay 3 power – Destroy an assigned Goa'uld or Jaffa adversary, or a Goa'uld or Jaffa obstacle at the current mission.

card.name: T.E.R.
card.property: Stop this gear, pay 2 power – Reveal a random card from your opponent's hand. If it's a villain card, that opponent discards it.

card.name: Transport Rings
card.property: Stop this gear, pay 3 power – Ready a character.

card.name: Writings from Heliopolis
card.property: Stop this gear, pay 1 power – Destroy a Culture obstacle at the current mission. Your opponent gains power equal to that obstacle's cost.

card.name: Zat Gun
card.property: Stop this gear, pay power as listed below – Chose a Combat obstacle and do one of the following: 1 power – It gets difficulty -1. 2 power – Remove its failure text. 3 power – Destroy it.

card.name: Acquire Specimen
card.property: This mission gets +1 difficulty for each obstacle at the current mission.

card.name: Antarctic Rescue
card.property: When you play this mission, your opponent chooses a team character. That character is blocked.

card.name: Attend Triad
card.property: Success: You may take a character card from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Avert Disaster
card.property: Failure: Destroy all support characters.

card.name: Beneath the Surface
card.property: When you play this mission, your opponent stops a team character.

card.name: Brief Candle
card.property: When you play this mission, stop a character.

card.name: Conduct Repairs
card.property: Success: You may take a gear card from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Contact the Asgard
card.property: Success: Assigned adversaries can't be revived.

card.name: Convert Jaffa
card.property: If there have been no successful missions this turn, this mission gets difficulty +1.

card.name: Cultural Exchange
card.property: When you play this mission, you may ready a support character.

card.name: Cure the Vorlix
card.property: Success: You may search your deck for a character card. If you do, reveal it, take it into hand, and shuffle your deck.

card.name: Defeat Ashrak
card.property: Each time you assign a character who has a glyph, your opponent loses 1 power.

card.name: Destroy Battleship
card.property: Failure: Your opponent gains 2 power.

card.name: Destroy Minor Goa'uld
card.property: Success: Destroy an adversary.

card.name: Disclosure
card.property: This mission gets +1 difficulty for each failed mission this turn.

card.name: Escape the Keeper
card.property: This mission gets difficulty +1 for each glyph on each assigned character.

card.name: Establish Communication
card.property: Each time you assign Jack O'Neill, you may discard any number of cards, then refill your hand.

card.name: Evacuate Village
card.property: Each assigned team character who has a glyph gets Combat +1.

card.name: Explore Genetics Lab
card.property: Failure: Your opponent may discard a card, then refill their hand.

card.name: Expose Blackmail
card.property: Success: Ready a support character.

card.name: Fall of Earth
card.property: You can't play support characters.

card.name: Infiltrate Summit
card.property: This mission gets difficulty +1 while an adversary is assigned.

card.name: Investigate Disappearance
card.property: When you play this mission, destroy a support character.

card.name: Investigate Plague
card.property: When you play this mission, lose 2 power.

card.name: Locate Renegades
card.property: Failure: The next mission played this turn gets difficulty +1.

card.name: Loop of Kon Garat
card.property: This mission gets difficulty -1 while Samantha Carter is assigned.

card.name: Offworld Research
card.property: Each assigned support character gets Science +1.

card.name: Pandemic Containment
card.property: Complications cost -1 power to play.

card.name: Prevent Invasion
card.property: When you play this mission, your opponent may take an obstacle card from their discard pile into hand.

card.name: Prison Break
card.property: When you play this mission, stop all support characters. Success: Ready all support characters.

card.name: Pursue the Harcesis
card.property: Daniel Jackson gets Culture +1 for each other assigned team character.

card.name: Relocate Advanced Civilization
card.property: When you play this mission, your opponent may refill their hand.

card.name: Repel Cronus
card.property: When you play this mission, you may pay 1 power. If you do, ready Teal'c.

card.name: Rescue Operative
card.property: When you play this mission, your opponent chooses a support character. Failure: Destroy the chosen character.

card.name: Research Advanced Races
card.property: Success: You may look at the top card of your mission pile, then place it on the top or bottom of that pile.

card.name: Retrieve Artifact
card.property: Complications cost power +1 to play.

card.name: Salvage Technology
card.property: Success: You may search your deck for a card. If you do, reveal it, take it into hand, and shuffle your deck.

card.name: Search and Rescue
card.property: Success: Ready a character.

card.name: Seek and Capture
card.property: When you play this mission, your opponent stops an adversary.

card.name: Seek Assistance
card.property: Each assigned Asgard character gets Culture +1. Success: The next mission this turn gets difficulty -1.

card.name: Stall Enemy
card.property: To assign an adversary, your opponent pays 1 power for each assigned character.

card.name: Supply Raid
card.property: Success: Your opponent loses 2 power.

card.name: Survey Goa'uld Pleasure Palace
card.property: This mission gets difficulty +1 while there is at least one complication.

card.name: Time Loop
card.property: Failure: You can't play any more missions this turn.

card.name: Training Exercises
card.property: Each time you assign a character who has no glyph, your opponent gains 1 power.

card.name: Uncover the Stargate
card.property: To assign a support character, you must pay 2 power.

card.name: What Fate Omaroca?
card.property: This mission gets difficulty -1 while at least one character who has a Gemini glyph is assigned.

card.name: Wormhole X-Treme!
card.property: Obstacles cost power +1 to play.

card.name: Advanced Technology
card.property: Withdraw 2. (Destroy this obstacle - gain 2 power.) When you play this obstacle, choose a support character. They are blocked.

card.name: Alien Orb
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose a team character. They are blocked. Failure: Incapacitate the chosen character.

card.name: Assembled Ranks
card.property: When you play this obstacle, draw one card for each ready adversary.

card.name: Babysitting Job
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose a ready character who could be assigned to the current mission. Until they are, all other characters are blocked.

card.name: Betrayed by an Ally
card.property: Withdraw 2. (Destroy this obstacle - gain 2 power.) Failure: Stop a character.

card.name: Big Bug
card.property: This obstacle costs power -1 to play for each other Replicator card at the current mission.

card.name: Blinded
card.property: Failure: Incapacitate a team character.

card.name: Blood of Sokar
card.property: Failure: Incapacitate a team character. Then, if a Goa'uld adversary is assigned, you may take this obstacle into your hand.

card.name: Body Swap
card.property: Failure: Choose one: Stop a character, or your opponent stops two ready characters.

card.name: Botched Rescue
card.property: Withdraw 2. Failure: Stop a character.

card.name: Brainwashing
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose a support character. They are blocked. Failure: Destroy the chosen character.

card.name: Cannon Tower
card.property: Each character who has 1 Combat or less is blocked.

card.name: Carnivorous Creature
card.property: When you play this obstacle, destroy an assigned support character.

card.name: Cloaked Ashrak
card.property: Failure: Destroy a support character.

card.name: Cor-ai
card.property: Failure: Choose a glyph. Your opponent puts it on the bottom of their mission pile, then places the top card of their mission pile as a glyph beneath the character who lost the chosen glyph.

card.name: Corrosive Spray
card.property: Failure: For each other Replicator card at the current mission, destroy a support character.

card.name: Curse of Morgan le Fay
card.property: Failure: Incapacitate all assigned team characters.

card.name: Damaged DHD
card.property: Failure: Stop all team characters.

card.name: Disadvantaged
card.property: When you play this obstacle, draw a card.

card.name: Dissolution
card.property: Withdraw 2. Failure: Destroy a support character.

card.name: Endless Scenario
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose a character. They are blocked. Failure: Stop the chosen character.

card.name: Endure the Tests
card.property: Failure: Incapacitate a team character.

card.name: The Enemy Within
card.property: Failure: Place this obstacle on a support character and stop them. They become an adversary under your control, with no game text, the Goa'uld trait, and a revive cost equal to their cost. They can't be scored.

card.name: Engineered Virus
card.property: This obstacle costs power -2 to play while a Goa'uld adversary is assigned. Failure: Destroy a support character.

card.name: Excavation
card.property: Each character who has 1 Culture or less is blocked.

card.name: Fire Rain
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose a character for each other obstacle at the current mission. Those characters are blocked.

card.name: Force Field
card.property: This obstacle's difficulty is equal to the power you have remaining.

card.name: Forced Labor Camp
card.property: Failure: Place this obstacle on a character. They are blocked, and any player may perform this action: "Pay 3 power – Destroy this obstacle."

card.name: Full Investigation
card.property: Failure: Your opponent incapacitates a team character. Stop all other characters.

card.name: Gadmeer Terraformer
card.property: Failure: Destroy a support character.

card.name: Goa'uld Wrath
card.property: When you play this obstacle, gain 2 power for each successful mission this turn.

card.name: Goa'uld Bomb
card.property: Failure: Choose a glyph. Your opponent puts it on the bottom of their mission pile.

card.name: Going Wacko
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose a character. They are blocked.

card.name: Historic Writings
card.property: Failure: You may take a Culture obstacle card from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Homicidal Robotic Clone
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose an assigned character. This obstacle's difficulty is equal to the skill that character is contributing to the current mission.

card.name: Hot Pursuit
card.property: Withdraw 2. (Destroy this obstacle - gain 2 power.) When you play this obstacle, if a Goa'uld or Jaffa adversary is assigned, choose a character. That character is blocked.

card.name: Idle Hands
card.property: This obstacle's difficulty is equal to the number of glyphs beneath ready characters.

card.name: Implanted
card.property: This obstacle costs power -1 to play while a Goa'uld adversary is assigned. Failure: Incapacitate a team character.

card.name: Infested Ships
card.property: This obstacle gets difficulty +1 for each other Replicator card at the current mission.

card.name: Information Leak
card.property: Failure: You may move a glyph from one team character to another.

card.name: Insurgency
card.property: Failure: Choose one: Destroy a ready support character; or destroy two stopped support characters.

card.name: Interdimensional Creatures
card.property: Withdraw 1. (Destroy this obstacle - gain 1 power.) This obstacle gets difficulty +1 for each assigned support character.

card.name: Lack of Experience
card.property: This obstacle costs power -1 to play while a team character who has no glyph is assigned.

card.name: Lockdown
card.property: Withdraw 2. (Destroy this obstacle - gain 2 power.) When you play this obstacle, choose a support character. They are blocked.

card.name: Loss of Funding
card.property: Failure: Stop all characters.

card.name: Making an Example
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose a team character. They are blocked. Failure: Incapacitate the chosen character.

card.name: Mind Probe
card.property: Failure: You may move a glyph from one team character to another.

card.name: Naquadria Hallucinations
card.property: When you play this obstacle, ready an assigned character. They are blocked.

card.name: Nightwalkers
card.property: Failure: Stop all support characters.

card.name: Out of Phase
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose a character. They are blocked. Failure: Stop the chosen character.

card.name: Out of Your Depth
card.property: Failure: You may take a Science obstacle card from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Overrun
card.property: To assign a character, your opponent pays 1 power for each other Replicator card at the current mission.

card.name: Parasitic Insects
card.property: Failure: Stop a team character.

card.name: Philosophical Differences
card.property: This obstacle's difficulty is equal to the number of different traits (other than "character, " "team, " and "support") on all assigned characters.

card.name: Power Surge
card.property: Withdraw 2. (Destroy this obstacle - gain 2 power.) Failure: Destroy a gear.

card.name: Prior Outbreak
card.property: Failure: Destroy all stopped support and assigned support characters.

card.name: Prolonged Torture
card.property: When you play this obstacle, incapacitate a stopped team character.

card.name: Red Sky
card.property: This obstacle gets difficulty +1 for each failed mission this turn.

card.name: Renewal
card.property: When you play this obstacle, you may ready an adversary.

card.name: Repeating Time
card.property: Each assigned character gets skills -1. Failure: Each character gets skills -1 until the end of the turn.

card.name: Rid Yourself of Burdens
card.property: Each time your opponent assigns a character, they discard a random card.

card.name: Sabotage
card.property: Failure: Destroy a gear.

card.name: Salish Spirits
card.property: Failure: Destroy a support character.

card.name: Senate Expense Review
card.property: Failure: Your opponent chooses a glyph and puts it on the bottom of their mission pile.

card.name: Serpent Guards
card.property: This obstacle costs power -1 to play while a team character who has no glyph is assigned.

card.name: Shock Grenade
card.property: Failure: Stop all characters.

card.name: Stonewalled
card.property: This obstacle costs power -1 to play while a Political adversary is assigned. When you play this obstacle, stop a character.

card.name: System Overload
card.property: Failure: Destroy a gear.

card.name: Team Compromised
card.property: When you play this obstacle, your opponent chooses a ready team character. They are blocked.

card.name: Telekinetic Mutants
card.property: When you play this obstacle, your opponent stops a character.

card.name: Tight Rein
card.property: To assign a character, your opponent stops another character.

card.name: Too Close Encounter
card.property: Failure: For each other Replicator card at the current mission, stop a character.

card.name: Touch of Corruption
card.property: When you play this obstacle, stop a character, then ready a stopped character.

card.name: Troop Landing
card.property: Failure: Destroy a stopped support or assigned support character.

card.name: Under Fire
card.property: This obstacle costs power -2 to play while a Jaffa adversary is assigned. Failure: Destroy a support character.

card.name: Under Suspicion
card.property: Failure: Place this obstacle on a character. To assign them, your opponent pays 2 power. When your opponent succeeds at a mission, destroy this obstacle.

card.name: Unlikely Friends
card.property: When you play this obstacle, ready an assigned character. They are blocked.

card.name: Urgo's Influence
card.property: Withdraw 2. (Destroy this obstacle - gain 2 power.) This obstacle gets difficulty +1 for each assigned character who has a glyph.

card.name: Water-Based Life Forms
card.property: Failure: Choose One: Stop a team character, or destroy a support character.

card.name: Cameron Mitchell
card.property: Each time you play a mission that has a glyph matching one of Cameron Mitchell's, you may pay 3 power and discard a card. If you do, ready him.

card.name: Daniel Jackson
card.property: Orion and Triangulum: At the end of your power phase, you may search your mission pile for a mission. If you do, shuffle the rest of the pile, then put the mission on top of it.

card.name: Jack O'Neill
card.property: Each time Jack O'Neill earns a glyph he already has, you may look at the top two cards of your mission pile, then place them in any order on the top and/or bottom of that pile.

card.name: Samantha Carter
card.property: Each time you assign Samantha Carter to a mission that has a glyph matching one of hers, you may pay 1 power. If you do, destroy an obstacle at the current mission.

card.name: Teal'c
card.property: Scorpius, Stop and incapacitate Teal'c – Ready all other SGC team and Jaffa team characters.

card.name: Vala Mal Doran
card.property: Stop Vala Mal Doran, put a Libra or Pisces glyph from beneath her on the bottom of your mission pile – Place the top card of your mission pile beneath Vala Mal Doran.
